title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long armed cross, back, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Long vertical sampler with horizontal bands of geometric pattern in blue, green, yellow, red and pink on a natural ground. Trimmed with two tassels at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long armed cross, back, and double running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-435.
